mapper.update: update orderbill set sn = #{sn}, vdate = #{vdate}, status = #{status}, totalAmount = #{totalAmount}, totalNumber = #{totalNumber}, auditTime = #{auditTime}, inputTime = #{inputTime}, inputUser_id = #{inputUser.id}, auditor_id = #{auditor.id}, supplier_id = #{supplier.id} where id = #{id}
